member.name: T:GFunctions.Mathnet.KinematicMath
member.summary: Contains various calculation methods for kinematics

member.name: M:GFunctions.Mathnet.KinematicMath.RotationMatrixFromPRY(System.Double[])
member.summary: Gets a rotation matrix from pitch roll yaw angles

member.name: M:GFunctions.Mathnet.KinematicMath.VectorLength(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Gets the length between two Nd vectors of the same order

member.name: M:GFunctions.Mathnet.KinematicMath.RotateVector(System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Rotates a vector by the given pitch roll yaw angles
member.param: Pitch, roll, yaw rotation in degrees

member.name: M:GFunctions.Mathnet.KinematicMath.CalcGlobalCoord(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Calculates a coordinates with the applied translations and rotation
member.param: Pitch, roll, yaw rotation in degrees

member.name: M:GFunctions.Mathnet.KinematicMath.CalcGlobalCoord2(System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double[],System.Double[])
member.summary: Calculates a coordinates with the applied translations and rotation
member.param: Pitch, roll, yaw rotation in degrees
Coordinates of the rotation center (x,y,z) relative to the local coordinate
